article_node.title: Best Labor Day Washer And Dryer Sales 2025 - Forbes Vetted
article_node.summary: The article highlights Labor Day sales on washers and dryers, featuring discounts up to 40% on models from LG, Samsung, Maytag, GE, and Electrolux. Key deals include LG Turbowash at 25% off, Samsung front‑load washer at 28% off, and Electrolux dryer at 30% off. Retailers such as The Home Depot, Best Buy, Lowe’s, and Amazon are offering these promotions, with many appliances also receiving additional savings for members or through coupon codes. The piece emphasizes the timing of Labor Day as a prime window for appliance bargains before Black Friday, encouraging shoppers to act quickly to secure the best prices.
